parameter.description: Pseudo-adiabatic potential temperature or equivalent potential temperature
Water equivalent of accumulated snow depth
Rain fraction of total cloud water
Total column water (Vertically integrated total water (vapour + cloud water/ice))
Large scale snowfall rate water equivalent
Total column integrated water (all components including precipitation)
Zonal flux of gravity wave stress
Meridional flux of gravity wave stress
Standard deviation of sub-grid scale orography
Natural logarithm of pressure in Pa
Net short-wave radiation flux (top of atmosphere)
Net short-wave radiation flux, clear sky
Net long-wave radiation flux (top of atmosphere)
Net long-wave radiation flux, clear sky
Number of cloud droplets per unit mass of air
Number of cloud ice particles per unit mass of air
Number density of cloud ice particles
Equivalent radar reflectivity factor for rain
Equivalent radar reflectivity factor for snow
Equivalent radar reflectivity factor for parameterized convection
Time-integrated air concentration of caesium pollutant
Time-integrated air concentration of iodine pollutant
Time-integrated air concentration of radioactive pollutant
Mass mixing ratio (mass fraction in air)
Atmosphere net production and emission mass flux
Chemical gross production rate of concentration
Chemical gross destruction rate of concentration
Total yearly average burden of the atmosphere
Seconds prior to initial reference time (defined in Section 1)
Flash flood guidance (Encoded as an accumulation over a floating subinterval of time between the reference time and valid time)
Flash flood runoff (Encoded as an accumulation over a floating subinterval of time)
Snow water equivalent per cent of normal
Conditional per cent precipitation amount fractile for an overall period (Encoded as an accumulation)
Per cent precipitation in a sub-period of an overall period (Encoded as per cent accumulation over the sub-period)
Soil moisture parameter in canopy conductance
Number of soil layers in root zone
Fire outlook extreme critical risk area
Cloudy radiance (with respect to wave number)
Clear-sky radiance (with respect to wave number)
Significant height of combined wind waves and swell
Deviation of sea level from mean
Seconds prior to initial reference time (defined in Section 1)
